My Publication

  • “Reconstruction of metabolic pathways by combining probabilistic graphical model-based and knowledge-based methods”, Qi Qi, Jilong Li, and Jianlin Cheng, BMC Proceedings, 2014, 8(Suppl 6):S5. link

  • “Comparison of Probabilistic Chain Graphical Model Based and Gaussian Process Based Observation Selections for Wireless Sensor Scheduling”, Qi Qi, Yi Shang, International Journal of Distributed Sensor Networks, vol. 2011, article ID 928958, 2011. link

  • “An Improved Algorithm for Optimal Subset Selection in Chain Graphical Models”, Qi Qi, Yi Shang, and Hongchi Shi, Evolutionary Computation (CEC), 2010 IEEE Congress on, pp. 1-6, 2010. link

  • “Comparing Probabilistic Graphical Model Based and Gaussian Process Based Selections for Predicting the Temporal Observations”, Qi Qi, Yi Shang, Intelligent Engineering Systems Through Artificial Neural Networks, 2010, vol.20, pages 621-628, ASME Press, New York, NY. link

  • “Wireless Sensor Networks in Intelligent Transportation Systems”, Malik Tubaishat, Peng Zhuang, Qi Qi, and Yi Shang, Journal of Wireless Communications and Mobile Computing, John Wiley and Sons Ltd., 2009, Vol. 9, pp. 287-302. link

  • “Model-based Traffic Prediction Using Sensor Networks”, Peng Zhuang, Qi Qi, and Yi Shang, In Proc. 5th IEEE Cosumer Communication and Networking Conference (CCNC’08), 2008, pp. 136-140. link

  • “Wireless Sensor-Based Traffic Light Control”, Malik Tubaishat, Qi Qi, Yi Shang, and Hongchi Shi, In Proc. 5th IEEE Consumer Communications and Networking Conference (CCNC’08), 2008, pp. 702-706. link
